column4: can we use a remote computer processor to run a native application?
You can x forward which would only appear to make that happen, or a NFS, or yes, clustering
IDK, never done it before.  I suggest network filesystem for only 2 machines though.  Clustering is more for high performance computing with many machines
Clustering is not a simple thing to set up:  https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MpichCluster
